item.title: Crown Store Showcase‚ÄîJune 2024
item.description: Find a home on the high seas or claim Undaunted plunder with new Crown Store goods this month!
item.content:encoded:
Find a home on the high seas or claim Undaunted plunder with new Crown Store goods this month!

Below, you can review all the items available in (and coming to) the in-game Crown Store throughout June 2024. Don't forget to also check out what is currently available on the Crown Store page. Fancy any of these goods? Then head over to the Buy Crowns page to secure the crowns you need! Certain items and offers will be available for a limited time only, so be sure to read their details below and don't miss out.

ESO Plus Deals

All ESO Plus‚Ñ¢ members have access to a monthly selection of exclusive deals and items. You can find more information about them in this article.

Exclusive Free Items

Statuette: Peryite, Blightlord

A miniature statue of Peryite, the Daedric Prince of Pestilence.

The Statuette: Peryite, Blightlord will be available in the Crown Store FREE, exclusively to ESO Plus Members on all platforms for a limited time, from June 27, 2024 at 10 AM EDT, to July 29, 2024 at 10 AM EDT.

Crafting

Crown Crafting Motif: Huntsman

For those who would honor Hircine the Hunter, it is right and proper to adopt the apparel and arms of his Huntsmen, those spear-shakers, fewterers, and whippers-in of the Lord of the Hunting Grounds.‚ÄîUraccanach the Witchman

The Crown Crafting Motif: Huntsman will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 3, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 6, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. Huntsman Motif chapters, and very rarely the complete book, have a chance to drop from Balorgh in March of Sacrifices.

Crown Crafting Motif: Shardborn

Glass-smiths form Shardborn arms and armor using creatia and sand in secretive techniques they hold dear. Use to learn the Shardborn crafting style.

The Crown Crafting Motif: Shardborn will be available in the Crown Store with the launch of Gold Road and Update 42 coming June 3, 2024 for PC/Mac, and on June 18, 2024 for Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, and PlayStation 5. Shardborn Motif chapters, and very rarely the complete book, have a chance to drop from Skingrad Reward Coffers, acquired by completing daily Delve quests from Lieutenant Agrance and daily World Boss quests from Commander Salerius in Skingrad.

Crown Crafting Motif: Wayward Guardian

Arana of the Ghostsong Clan notes this about Wayward Guardian gear: "If the deepfolk sought the protection of the Witch, Hunter, and Headsman to create their otherworldly works, let us turn that strength against our equally unnatural foes." Use to learn the Wayward Guardian crafting style.

The Crown Crafting Motif: Wayward Guardian will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 6, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 10, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. Wayward Guardian Motif chapters have a chance to drop from a Wayward Guardian's Cache, acquired by completing daily quests from Ardanir in Markarth.

Crown Crafting Motif: Meridian

From ancient times till the present, the Cult of Meridia, no matter how often suppressed, always rebounds and reappears. Mortals who revere her often honor her by adopting an armor style inspired by that of the Aurorans, Meridia's Daedric warriors. Use to learn the Meridian crafting style.

The Crown Crafting Motif: Meridian will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 10, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 13, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. Meridian Motif chapters, and very rarely the complete book, have a chance to drop from Symphony of Blades in the Depths of Malatar.

Crown Crafting Motif: Nighthollow

The panoply of the Nighthollow vampires evokes the sublime terror of their shadowy domain. Mortals who see this fearsome armor rarely keep their blood for long. Use to learn the Nighthollow crafting style.

The Crown Crafting Motif: Nighthollow will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 24, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 27, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. Nighthollow Motif chapters, and very rarely the complete book, have a chance to drop from Markarth Reward Coffers, acquired by completing the Harrowstorm daily quest for Nelldena in Markarth.

Outfit Style

Symphony of Blades Arms Pack

Urgarlag Chief-bane may tell you of the sunken ruins of Malatar, where Meridia's champions‚Äîsuch as the Symphony of Blades‚Äîawait. Alter your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Symphony of Blades awards by using this complete set of Outfit styles.

The Symphony of Blades Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 3, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 6, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from Symphony of Blades from veteran Depths of Malatar. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Urgarlag Chief-bane for 50 Undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Urgarlag's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement ‚ÄúThrowing Shade‚Äù increases the drop chances of both items.

Ilambris Arms Pack

Undaunted veteran Glirion may warn you of the Ilambris twins, who serve as wardens in the Crypt of Hearts, Alter your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Ilambris awards by using this complete set of Outfit styles.

The Ilambris Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 10, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 13, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from the Ilambris twins from veteran Crypt of Hearts I. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Glirion the Redbeard for 50 Undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Glirion's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement ‚ÄúA Crypt for Two‚Äù increases the drop chances of both items.

Pirate Skeleton Arms Pack

Captain Blackheart and his pirate crew may control an idyllic haven in Bangkorai, but Glirion the Redbeard hopes to change that‚Äîthrough you. Alter your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Pirate Skeleton awards by using this complete set of Outfit styles.

The Pirate Skeleton Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 13, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 17, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from Captain Blackheart from veteran Blackheart Haven. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Glirion the Redbeard for 50 Undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Glirion's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement ‚ÄúThoroughly Plundered‚Äù increases the drop chances of both items.

Gold Road Dragoon Arms Pack

Those who patrol and ensure the safety of travelers along the Gold Road use matching weapons that feature the red diamond. Alter your weapon's appearance to match the Gold Road Dragoon Weapons by using this complete set of Gold Road Dragoon Outfit styles.

The new Gold Road Dragoon Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store during the Zeal of Zenithar event, from June 20, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 2, 2024 at 10AM EDT. Matching armor pages will drop from Zenithar's Sublime Parcel, obtainable once per day for the duration of the event. Bound versions of the armor pages can be purchased from the Impresario for 5 Event Tickets each during the event.

Anvil of Zenithar Arms Pack

The blessings of Zenithar, God of Work and Commerce, light up weapons forged on his sacred anvil. Alter your weapon's appearance by using this complete set of Anvil of Zenithar Outfit styles.

The Anvil of Zenithar Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 24, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 27, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Wardrobe

Rimmen Fountain-Side Loungewear

Famed for their clear water, the fountains of Rimmen provide a place for locals to gather and catch up on the news of the day. If you seek a moment of refreshment, wear this elegant yet comfortable garb as you dangle your feet in the cool waters.

The Rimmen Fountain-Side Loungewear costume will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 10, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 13, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Pirate Costume Pack

The pirates of the Abecean Sea are among Tamriel's fiercest sea raiders‚Äîand they have a style all their own, which you can adopt when you don these jaunty and rakish costumes!

The Pirate Costume Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 13, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 17, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Dremora Deceiver Duster

In the ceaseless wars of Oblivion, there will always be scoundrels. After rooking marks of goods and foes of lives, this rugged, Dremora-style coat lets you slink away, sounding no louder than a whisper.

The Dremora Deceiver Duster will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 24, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 27, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Crate

Dwarven Crate

A mystery collection of Dwarven-themed items!

Dwarven Crates return to the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 6, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 20, 2024 at 10AM EDT.

DLC

Necrom Deluxe Pack

Includes all the bonus content of the Necrom Deluxe Edition, as well as the Necrom pre-purchase digital items.

The Necrom Deluxe Pack will be available in the Crown Store with the launch of Gold Road and Update 42 coming June 3, 2024 for PC/Mac, and on June 18, 2024 for Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, and PlayStation 5.

Necrom

What truths are best left hidden? Discover Necrom and delve into the forbidden secrets of Apocrypha. From Morrowind's Telvanni Peninsula to Hermaeus Mora's realm, fight to preserve reality.

The Necrom Chapter will be available in the Crown Store with the launch of Gold Road and Update 42 coming June 3, 2024 for PC/Mac, and on June 18, 2024 for Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, and PlayStation 5.

Class: Arcanist

Unlocks the Arcanist class for use in character creation.

The Arcanist class will be available in the Crown Store with the launch of Gold Road and Update 42 coming June 3, 2024 at 2AM EDT for PC/Mac, and on June 18, 2024 at 2AM EDT for Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, and PlayStation 5.

Events

Currency

Event Tickets

A ticket used to purchase rare goods from The Impresario, Event Merchant. Curious as to what goods? Well, chat with her to see what she has to offer!

Single Event Tickets will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time during the Zeal of Zenithar event, from June 20, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 2, 2024 at 10AM EDT. Event Tickets are also giftable to other players from within the Crown Store.

Furniture

Music Box, Subterranean Sonata

When activated, plays a music box arrangement of the otherworldly "Subterranean Sonata" composition.

The Music Box, Subterranean Sonata will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 6, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 10, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Furnishing Pack: Maormer Boarding Party

The Sea Elves rule the waves, but you've beaten them just the same. Celebrate your victory in battle by furnishing your home with "liberated" serpentine items, including a raiding party tent and a Maormer ship's prow!

The Furnishing Pack: Maormer Boarding Party will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 13, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 27, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Cadwell's Astounding Portal

Ready for a jolly good time with Cadwell? Summon him to your home with this handy portal, and he'll play a tune, juggle fish, indulge in some chit-chat, or more! Alas, Cadwell refuses to do preview performances.

Cadwell's Astounding Portal will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 17, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to June 20, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Furnishing Pack: Aquatic Splendor

Add oceanic depth to your abode with this seaworthy arrangement of home furnishings. An abundance of vibrant coral and kelp, effervescent bubbles and jellyfish, and even a mudcrab sparring partner can turn your home into a deep-sea wonderland.

The Furnishing Pack: Aquatic Splendor will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from June 27, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 11, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Houses

Merryvine Estate

Merryvine's wines once rivaled those of the nearby Valente Vineyard, but misfortune sent its former owner fleeing. This sun-kissed estate features fertile grapevines, a house suitable for entertaining, and facilities that would please any vintner.

Merryvine Estate will be available in the Crown Store with the launch of Gold Road and Update 42 coming June 3, 2024 for PC/Mac, and on June 18, 2024 for Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, and PlayStation 5. Furnished and unfurnished versions will be available.

The Fair Winds

Enjoy sea-based living on the Fair Winds, a spacious galleon hailing from the Systres Isles. You have a bevy of travel options a mere spin of the ship's wheel away, with ports of call in Vulkhel Guard, Davon's Watch, and Daggerfall. Just watch for ornaugs!

item.title: Crown Store Gifting Update ‚Äì October 2023
item.content:encoded:
Following up on Studio Director Matt Firor's message last month about the current and future status of Crown Store Gifting, we are moving forward with re-enabling this functionality for eligible players at the account level. In this post, we will detail what to expect.

In September, we temporarily disabled Crown Store gifting due to a rapidly growing issue of "bad actors" using various fraudulent means to amass crowns without paying for them, then using them in turn to sell Crown Store items to players for real-world cash outside of the game client. That said, we recognize that gifting is a meaningful part of our community, and we are in the process of manually re-enabling Crown Store gifting access for select players who meet our specific criteria. This work will be complete tomorrow, October 11, during the maintenance window from 09:00 AM ET to 12:00 PM ET.

Gifting eligibility is determined by an evolving list of factors including but not limited to the account being at least 180 days past its first login and previous engagement with in-game features. You may check if you have access to gifting in-game via the Crown Store as well as via your billing history page in the ESO account center. If you have access to Crown Store gifting, you will see "Allow Crown Store Gifting" in your billing history. If you try to send a gift via the in-game Crown Store and do not have access, you will see a "Gifting Locked" pop-up message. Please note that we are exploring better ways to display this information in-game in the future, such as updating the Gifting Tutorial.

If you do not have access to Crown Store gifting after it is re-enabled on October 11, 2023, and wish for a review of your account, please visit https://help.elderscrollsonline.com and submit a Customer Support ticket. Please choose the Billing / Purchase / Code category then Platform > I have a question about a sale / offer > I want to send gift items from this account.

We appreciate everyone's understanding and patience while we get this solution up and running. Multiple teams have worked long hours to evaluate the best technical solutions that we could stand up in a reasonably short time, while also prioritizing the Crown Store gifting player experience. We are dedicated to continuing to explore ways to make this better and reduce fraudulent activity in ESO. Thanks again for being a part of our community and for your continued support.

item.title: New Patcher Rollout
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone! After plenty of testing during the last PTS period, we are pleased to announce the rollout of our new patcher on the live servers for PC/Mac. The rollout of the new patcher will happen in four phases, with new countries being added during each phase. As we give countries access to the new patcher, we will make note of it in the list below by noting next to the country name (has the new patcher.) We will also note what phase we are currently in by specifying whether it has not started, in progress, or complete, next to the phase number. The countries getting the patcher are listed in order below.

Thanks for your patience as we roll this out to all countries listed below. A special thanks to everyone who helped test out the launcher during the last PTS and provided feedback.
